description: The Alt-Svc HTTP response header indicates that an alternative service is available for the resource being requested.

response-directives.description: Indicates that any previously cached alternative service information for the resource should be cleared.
Specifies the authority (host and port) of the alternative service.
The ALPN protocol identifier. Examples include h2 for HTTP/2 and h3-25 for draft 25 of the HTTP/3 protocol.
The ALPN protocol identifier. Examples include h2 for HTTP/2 and h3-25 for draft 25 of the HTTP/3 protocol.
Specifies the maximum time in seconds that the alternative service should be considered valid.
